name: ThePhotoForum.com v0.2
description: This is a very simple re-skinning aimed at making the forum backgrounds darker grey. The color scheme is greys and blues, and mostly fits with the pre-existing elements of site. The photographs do look better, near as I can see.

user.name: amolitor
user.about: Just this ex-mathematician software developer amateur photographer guy.

additional_info:
Hat tip to Buckster, http://www.buckcash.com/ for the idea.

- This is version 0.1 let's say.
- Updated to v0.2, wrapped it in a URL-specifier to it only applies to thephotoforum.com.
